title: Riot is working to improve them game, thank them rather than complain.
body: You people are awful and ungrateful. The game is free to play and super fun. Stop coming on here and complaining about things you MIGHT not like in the future.

replies.body: Riot is a business, we give them money, they give us a service. We both get what we wanted already. We have no reason to be grateful for them anymore than we have to be grateful for Walmart or Microsoft.
I'd actually argue that complaints are more valuable than gratitude. Criticism is valid discussion.
